pr_title: CB-10299 modify BaseImageValidatorE2ETest case not to config explicitnew network for SDX internal calls

timeline.bodyText:
Can we have only one method for setting the network to null?
withEmtyNetwork does exactly the same
timeline.author: pkedvessy
